desc: ONLY essential oil of PALO SANTO 🌿extracted from its FRUIT, imported from Ecuador. Learn why it was considered SACRED by ancents Latin American SHAMANS and all the benefits of this wonderful tree. An ESSENTIAL OIL with a unique AROMA. Here!!🚩

layout.text: NEW! PALO SANTO FRUIT ESSENTIAL OIL
Balance your energy hand in hand with the essence of the palo santo fruit!
